titleInfo.title: Finite temperature QCD coupling constant - imaginary versus real time framework

mods.abstract: The correspondence between the imaginary time and real time thermal running coupling constant is discussed. The temperature dependence is derived in pure QCD at one-loop order in a generalized momentum subtraction (MOM) renormalization scheme.

originInfo.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC

titleInfo.title: Zeitschrift für Physik C: Particles and fields
